short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Crossover Chrome Extension to get URL from active tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Crossover Chrome extension is a helper extension  for Crossover productivity tool and is used to fetch URL of the Active Tab in Chrome. Its fetch the URL and pass it to a service already running on port 44340 on the localhost. Crossover productivity tool is used to measure the productivity of contractors working for Crossover or clients of crossover.
